input_email_body:
Subject: Issue Regarding Access to Medical Data

I am writing to report an issue with accessing medical data You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. This issue has appeared unexpectedly, and I suspect it might be due to a configuration problem or software glitch. I have already tried restarting the systems, checking permissions, and collecting error logs, but the issue persists. I would appreciate it if you could look into this matter and provide a solution as soon as possible. My name is Elena Ivanova.
